content: @nywynscorner eemmmmaa doll crochet pattern by nywyn s corner this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted over for sell or free nywyn s corner this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted over for sell or free abbreviations materials magic_ring magic_ring schachenmayr catania for outfit front loop fl & scheepjes catona for doll skin front loops only flo // 100% cotton 50g/125meters back loop bl hook size 2 0mm back loops only blo polyester fiberfill for stuffing stitch/stitches st/sts pins single_crochet single_crochet yarn sewing needle increase increase scissor & stitch markers 2 double_crochet in 1 stitch dcinc 10mm safety eyes decrease decrease round button x 3 double_crochet double_crochet black yarn or embroidery thread to half_double_crochet half_double_crochet embroider face details slip_stitch slip_stitch optional materials hot glue row/round r gun/fabric glue to attach hair chain chain strands 8cm long plastic straw repeat instructions with … x time 17cm long craft wire times @nywynscorner yarn colors suggested color a - catona 255 - shell color b - catania 212 - kiwi color c - catania 206 - honey color d - catania 429 - anthracite arms - start with color a work in spiral r31 3sc slip_stitch f/o and leave long - make 2 stuff to r19 tail r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 - join color b yarn into 1st fl of r2 6inc 12 the fl round that left from r18 to r3 12sc 12 make sleeve ruffles r4 3sc into 1 st 11sc 14 r32 ch2 double_crochet ch2 x 9 slip_stitch r5 3hdc 11sc 14 - f/o and weave in end r6 2dec 10sc 12 r7 2sc decrease x 3 9 r8 - r17 9sc 9 rounds - 9 r18 change to color b 9sc 9 r19 blo 9inc 18 r20 2sc increase x 6 24 r21 - r22 24sc 2 rounds -24 r23 2sc decrease x 6 18 r24 - r25 18sc 2 rounds - 18 r26 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 r27 -r28 12sc 2 rounds - 12 r29 4sc decrease x 2 10 r30 10sc 10 @nywynscorner this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted over for sell or free legs @nywynscorner - start with color d work around r18 color a blo 15sc 15 foundation chain r19 - r31 15sc 13 rounds - 15 - make 2 stuff firmly r32 4sc change to color d 11sc 15 r1 ch8 skip 1ch increase 5sc 4sc in last chain r33 - r34 15sc 2 rounds - 15 5sc increase 18 - for left leg stop at r34 slip_stitch & f/o r2 2inc 5sc 4inc 5sc 2inc 26
